TEXT: The applicant is a citizen of GPE , born in DATE and living in GPE in GPE . She was the wife of GPE
She is represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE .
On DATE P.A. was killed in a terrorist bombing in GPE in GPE . The car used for the bombing was stolen in GPE , GPE on DATE .

The NORP authorities conducted extensive inquiries but were unable to bring charges against any person . The files remain open . ORG ( ORG ) in GPE has conducted an inquiry into the theft of the vehicle and related offences which did not produce any results . However , there was no formal murder inquiry by the ORG .
On DATE ORG , a television station in GPE , broadcast a programme in which the adequacy of the ORG inquiry was discussed .
